name: node-layout-switcher

scripts.test:full: npm run test:dictionaries && npm run test:comprehensive && npm run test:conversion && npm run test:alt-combinations
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build
scripts.precommit: npm run check && npm run test:full
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.pkg:exe: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/node-layout-switcher-win-x64.exe
scripts.pkg:exe:all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output build/node-layout-switcher
scripts.prepkg:exe: if not exist build mkdir build
scripts.prepkg:exe:all: if not exist build mkdir build
scripts.postpkg:exe: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:keyserver
scripts.postpkg:exe:all: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:keyserver:all
scripts.copy:keyserver:all:
copy node_modules
ode-global-key-listener in\WinKeyServer.exe build\ /Y && copy node_modules
ode-global-key-listener in\X11KeyServer build\ /Y && copy node_modules
ode-global-key-listener in\MacKeyServer build\ /Y

author: koenigstag
description: A Node.js utility for automatic keyboard layout switching and text conversion between different languages and layouts (QWERTY, DVORAK). Supports English, Russian, Ukrainian, German, French, and Czech layouts with hotkey-based text replacement.
